items.summary: Update the Motoko backend `requestApprovalWithName(name)` flow to perform a strict, idempotent cleanup of **all** backend-stored records for the caller principal (pending approval state, approved state, admin/role state, stored profile/name, and any stored access-request/4-char-id metadata) **before** creating a new pending approval request and storing the new `{name, fourCharId}` request record.
